text: Even Twitter? Is this the best Twitter can come up with? So if Trump had tweeted his Clorox advice, Twitter would have boldly added: "Get the facts about shooting Clorox into your veins to kill Coronavirus". How about a really simple label on the tweet in bright red: "FALSE!"
